about_the_game:
Choose your fiend and battle endless hordes of enemies in this action-roguelike survivor game. Explore ever-changing stages, unlock new powerups and abilities, and grow stronger with every level.

Unlock more playable characters in The Fiendonomicon! Each fiend offers a unique playstyle with a passive ability and a set of 4 active skills. Whether you prefer an aggressive, defensive, passive, or active approach, mastering your fiend's strengths is key to progressing through the stages.

Each stage is randomly generated, offering new challenges every time. You'll find treasure chests, traps, powerful rewards guarded by enemies, and mysterious devices.

Each level up lets you choose 1 powerup from 3 options. Powerups come in two forms: Augmentations, which provide passive boosts, and Mutations, automatic weapons that trigger independently. Mix your fiend's abilities with different powerups to try new builds and wreak havoc.

Features:

  • 3 out of 9 playable characters in the Demo version.

  • 10 out of over 20 unique weapons in the Demo version.

  • Original soundtrack: every stage comes with its own exclusive music.

  • Endless build possibilities: combine fiend abilities with power-ups to experiment with various builds and strategies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-6300 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 7850 with 2 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A 64-bit processor and operating system are required.

short_description: Fight through endless hordes of enemies in FIENDRISE, an action-roguelike, bullet-hell game. Explore ever-changing areas, unlock powerful fiends, each with a unique set of abilities, and experiment with different builds to survive the chaos. This is the Demo version.
